entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `IndexOfAnyValues<string>` #85573
    8.0.0
  • "You must download or install .NET" task dialog repeatedly doubles in size on 200% DPI systems #85571
  • Suboptimal code generated for even a trivial ValueConverter #85570
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort receive 0x1A lead to exception #85567

Closed

  • llvm-symbolizer invocation failure #82544
  • Bug in DateTimeConverter when time has been specified #31527
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Compare host using OrdinalIgnoreCase instead of InvariantCultureIgnoreCase #85574
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion; add support for general recursive struct promotion #85569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_FIELD` #85568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not set pre-decided consecutive registers as busy (again) #85566
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix(70460): Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove static modifiers from ThreadPool events in NativeRuntimeEventSource.PortableThreadPool.NativeSinks.cs #85563
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

Merged

  • Replace InvariantCulture comparison with Ordinal #85572
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Reduce overheads of Regex.Replace with a text replacement string #85564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Delete `OBJ(LCL_ADDR)` args handling from local morph ref counting #85544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix/31527 invalid currentculture applying #85297
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

Updated

  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #85227
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some xarch emit logic #85536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Allocate Array.Empty<> on a frozen segment (NonGC heap) #85559
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Stop passing around struct handles in importer #85561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable regex to use IndexOf(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) for prefix searching #85438
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of IndexOf(chars, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) #85437
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Make optAssertionPropGlobal_RelOp less conservative for side-effects #85532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set lvSingleDef for non TYP_REF locals #85398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][aot] Refactor deduplication to use enum instead of flags #85384
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove cached Type instances #85557
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] Use Wasm SDK in browser template #85311
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Errors restoring runtime pack #32038
  • GenAPI drops internal ctor which results in compilation errors #32119
  • Error NETSDK1004 occurs when building any C++/CLI project. #31683
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix license headers in all source files #32141
    untriaged, Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Revert "Remove Unnecessary Check In RazorSourceGenerator Targets" #32139
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • dotnet-watch: Enable nullable annotations on project level #32137
    untriaged
  • Remove reference to 'BINDING' in 'BlazorHotReload.js' #32121
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Type of range variable cannot be determined if the query statement is incomplete #68032
  • IDE0051 should cover internal members in addition to private #68029

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting.CompilationErrorException: '(1,31): error CS1002: ; expected' #67038

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` branch #68031
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix internal compiler error when handling DynamicObjectCreationExpression #68030
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API Review: Make IAcceptsMetadata and IProducesResponseTypeMetadata public. #47994
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Does healthcheck close the connection properly? #47989

PullRequests

Created

  • 47992 #47993
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update #47992
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update PropertyColumn.cs #47991
    area-blazor, community-contribution

  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution

    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TTS: Speech rate in SpeechOptions and more #14851
  • [.net7][iOS] IconImageSource on TabbedPage Causes Crash [MAUI Blazor] [Related #12403] #14850
  • 7.0.81 Service Release 4 Serious Layout Problem #14849

Closed

  • Could not resolve assembly on .NET MAUI App project template and System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14844
  • "\bin\Debug\net6.0-windows10.0.19041\win10-x64\xxxxx.appxrecipe" is missing or malformed. #6398
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent behavior with RTL flow direction for custom layout #6413
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Removing skip attribute from SearchBarHandlerTests.CancelButtonColorInitializeCorrectly on Windows #14852

Merged

  • Enabling tolerance adjustment in iOS color verification tests #13945

Updated

  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-30

Issues

Created

  • Update many to many relationship by using skip navigation properties. #30798
  • Winui Database.Migrate() does not create new database if it does not already exist #30797

Updated

  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
